name: Rumble Darkly
description:
[NOTICE: No longer updating on userstyles.org, Check here for future updates.] Dark theme for Rumble with some nice extra features:
  • Subscribe/Unsubscribe distinctly coloured so you know to subscribe to new channels
  • +/- Rumble voting buttons redesigned and animated
  • Spotlight on hovered thumbnails to improve focus
  • Tabs on the home page improved and given subtle animation
  • Rumble logo used as the play button
  • Gently pulsing green down-light added to header bar.
additional_info:
[2022/01/25] Theme applied only on rumble.com
[2022/01/27] Widened max-width
[2022/01/02] Big update
